amount.description: The total amount of the invoice

forpackage.description: The package associated with the invoice

forinvoice.description: The invoice associated with the invoice in the case of a Credit

usage_days.description: The number of days since last billing

usage_dollars.description: The number of dollars since last billing

username.description: The user who caused this event

name.description: The display name for the instance

hostname.description: The host name for the instance

management_ip.description: The management IP of the instance

provision_date.description: The date that the instance was provisioned

create_job.description: The job id for the create job of this instance

device.description: Device the subnet is allocated to

id.description: The id of the ssh key

name.description: The name of the ssh key

fingerprint.description: The fingerprint for this ssh pub key

client_id.description: The client the user belongs to

active.description: Whether user is active or not. 1 or 0

force_pwd_change.description: Whether user is required to change password on next login or not. 1 or 0

size.description: Size in megabytes. If not provided, the partition will consume all remaining available space on the disk.

config_drive.description: Build a cloud-init config drive on this partition.

tags.description: List of tags to store along with this server. This is expected to be valid json.

custom_metadata.description: Key value hash to store along with this server. This is expected to be valid json.

modified.description: Valid values: ["ssh_keys","networks","user_data","admin_password"], Use this when you modify a field from the last time you reloaded the server and want the field to be empty.
